```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
load("./output/data.Rdata")
```
## Pdf map

```{r, fig.dim = c(8,12),echo=FALSE}
print(map_plot)

```


## Plotly map

```{r, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
p <- ggplotly(map_plot_plotly, tooltip=c("text"))
```

```{r include, echo = FALSE}
htmlwidgets::saveWidget(p, "index.html")

htmltools::tags$iframe(
  src=file.path(getwd(), "index.html"),
  width="100%",
  height="600",
  scrolling="no",
  seamless="seamless",
  frameBorder="0"
)

```

## Gif map

```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("./output/map.gif")
```
